base_description: Square teal fan with circular blades.
part_description: The fan has a square teal frame, circular grill, and five grey blades. A pull cord is attached to the bottom left corner.
internal_interaction_description: The fan blades rotate within the circular grill, driven by a motor housed in the center. The grill ensures safety while allowing airflow. The pull cord controls the fan’s speed or power, interacting with an internal switch mechanism.
external_interaction_description: The fan circulates air in a room when mounted on a wall. It can be operated via the pull cord by a person, adjusting airflow direction and speed to maintain a comfortable environment.
